item.title: Advanced Quote Ordering
item.description: Quotes Quotes are a way to save an order, and then easily duplicate the order later. You can create a quote from the control portal by going through the normal order process, and then instead of hitting “Order” at the end, there will be a button that says “Save Quote”, which will save the order for later. You can then use the quote service to pull down the information about it from the API.

item.title: Getting Started With User Data and Post Provisioning Scripts
item.description: The SoftLayer platform lets you add dynamic data and scripts when you place your order. The scripts are executed after the machine is booted. To place a script on a virtual server, the script must be available through a URL. Note: For HTTP URLs, the script is injected in the server and manually executed. For HTTPS URLs, the script is injected and automatically executed. In this article, we use https://x.
